data.name: Illuminated Door Sills
data.description: Add a premium touch to your Tesla by accentuating your vehicle's model name with Model S Illuminated Door Sills. This elegant addition requires no additional wiring to your vehicle's electrical system. Each sill is activated by a magnetic switch and powered by a long-lasting battery with LEDs for seamless installation.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in April 2016 - 2020.

data.name: Coat Hooks
data.description: Tesla Coat Hooks attach onto first row seatbacks with a simple snap system
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced before 12/9/2019 and Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020.

data.name: Rear Liftgate Sunshade
data.description: Constructed of lightweight mesh fabric with a collapsible rigid frame, the rear sunshade blocks two thirds of solar thermal load without compromising rearward visibility. Easily removable, the sunshade is installed onto the interior of the rear hatch window. When removed, the shade collapses and stores in a 16-inch diameter pouch
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020.

data.name: Panoramic Roof Sunshades
data.description: Constructed of lightweight mesh fabric with a collapsible rigid frame, the Panoramic Roof Sunshades block two thirds of solar thermal load. Easily removable, the sunshades are installed onto the interior of the front and rear panoramic roof windows. When removed, the shades collapse and store in an 18-inch square pouch
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles configured with the Panoramic Roof and produced in 2012-2020.

data.name: Performance Pedal Set
data.description: Enhance the style and appearance of your standard Model S or Model X with the Performance Pedal Set. Constructed of aluminum alloy with raised rubber sectioning, this set includes pedals for the accelerator and brake.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020 and Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase.

data.name: Quick Connection Phone Dock
data.description: Enhance the cockpit ergonomics of your Model S or Model X with the Quick Connection Phone Dock. No longer having to fiddle with loose charging cables, you will be able to blind holster your smartphone quickly and securely.
includes: 2x wide and narrow guides for your device
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020 and Model X vehicles produced in 2015-2020. For use with Integrated Center Console, the phone dock is not a service-installed accessory. This product is not compatible with 1st generation drop-in Premium Center Console.

data.name: Model S Car Cover
data.description: Outdoor||Shield your Tesla from the harshest of elements with this Outdoor Car Cover. With a middle layer of Thermoplastic Polyurethane and two outer layers of woven polyester, the cover allows for breathability while providing the best water resistance available today. Convenient charge port openings allow for connection to an outlet, and ventilated mesh allow for air flow while charging|Indoor||Stretch satin fits your Tesla like a glove, hugging its contours and protecting the paint finish from dings, scratches and dust that are imminent with indoor storage. Convenient charge port openings allow for connection to an outlet, and ventilated mesh allow for air flow while charging.
data.note: Compatible with all Model S vehicles.

data.name: Roof Rack - Glass Roof
data.description: Model S Roof Rack – Glass Roof was designed and engineered from the ground up for maximum aerodynamic efficiency, minimal interior noise and impact to range. The ultra-sleek attachment mechanism featuring die-cast towers and integrated locks makes for easy installation at home. The aluminum powder-coated cross bars include T-slots to seamlessly mount compatible attachments such as ski racks, bike racks and cargo boxes.
data.note: Compatible with all Model S vehicles. Any Model S built before February 11, 2019 must be retrofitted for roof rack compatibility. Load rating: 150lbs

data.name: Carbon Fiber Spoiler
data.description: Improve high speed stability by adding the carbon fiber spoiler to your trunk lid. Made from lightweight, cross-woven carbon fibers with a matte epoxy finish.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase

data.name: '19' Slipstream Wheel and Winter Tire Package
data.description: 'Outfit your Model S with new 19' Slipstream Tesla wheels and Pirelli winter-rated tires for the icy months ahead. The aerodynamic wheel design provides 2-3% range improvement based on simulated driving conditions.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase.

data.name: 21" Black Arachnid Wheel and Tire Package
data.description: Customize your Model S with sleek 21” Black Arachnid forged wheels for extreme sport handling. This package comes with low-profile Michelin Pilot Super Sport tires for exceptional steering and braking performance.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase.

data.name: 21" Turbine Wheel and Tire Package
data.description: Be daring with aggressive 21" Wheels that signify a performance vehicle. Preferred by many car enthusiasts, 21" wheels allow tires with a lower profile to ably fill in the wheel well for a modern, rich aesthetic. Continental high-performance tires come with the package.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase.

data.name: 21" Twin Turbine Wheel and Tire Package
data.description: With a visually striking design, the Tesla Twin Turbine wheels offer a more enjoyable driving experience by improving handling and acceleration. Michelin Pilot Super Sport high-performance tires come with the package to maximize the performance of your vehicle.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase.

data.name: Wheel Locks
data.description: Protect your Tesla Wheels with a specially-designed lock set. Forged steel construction and different key patterns provide maximum security.The kit is easy to use and functions like regular lug nuts do. The kit includes a special tool for installation and removal.

data.name: Tire Repair Sealant
data.description: For use specifically with the Tesla Tire Repair Kit, this sealant is a replacement for when the sealant included with the tire repair kit has been used or reaches its expiration date.

data.name: All-Weather Interior Mats
data.description: Model S All-Weather Interior Mats are made from a thermoplastic elastomer material for maximum protection and custom-fit coverage. Designed exclusively for Model S by Tesla Design Studio, the four piece set features two separate mats in the second row for easy removal and cleanup with a small Tesla wordmark lining each piece.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2021+.

data.name: All-Weather Interior Liners
data.description: Model S All-Weather Interior Liners are made from thermoplastic elastomer material for ultimate protection and spatial coverage. Unlike traditional floor mats, liners are comprised of vertical walls that ensure maximum protection to the interior carpet and easy cleanup.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020.

data.name: All-Weather Rear Trunk Liner Set
data.description: The Model S All-Weather Rear Trunk Liner Set is custom made using digital laser measurements for your Model S. This extreme-duty floor protection covers and protects your Model S by keeping it free from dirt and spills. The floor liners are made from thermoplastic elastomer material, which has a rigid core for unbeatable strength and easy cleanup.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles produced in 2012-2020.

data.name: Paint Repair Kit
data.description: Cover up paint chips from road debris and rocks with the Tesla Paint Repair Kit. Application is quick and allows users to easily fill in paint chips to a smooth surface within a few simple steps. This paint system is a two stage process of applying paint to cover the defect and then blending the excess paint to smooth the finish. This process can be repeated multiple times to build layers of paint and fill in chips of varying depth per the desired results.Please see the below detailed instructional video on this product. When placing your order, please ensure to match the product four-letter paint code with the vehicle paint code located on the label attached to the driver side door.
data.note: Paint Repair Kits are final sale. White is not compatible with Pearl White paint. Final results of Pearl White may appear slightly different than the rest of your vehicle depending on the lighting environment and application process used.

data.name: Roadside Safety Kit
data.description: Tesla Roadside Safety Kit keeps emergency supplies organized and compact in the rear or front trunk. This kit features essential first-aid items, reflective safety vest, warning triangle, emergency blanket and a highly durable and water-resistant Tesla storage bag. All of the items are organized in individual expandable pockets; the high-tech hook back panel keeps the kit in a fixed place.

data.name: HEPA Air Filtration Upgrade
data.description: Upgrade your Model S with HEPA Air Filtration for the freshest cabin air available. This package includes Bioweapon Defense Mode firmware as a feature of the HEPA system and comes with a new HEPA filter.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles with updated front bumper fascia and produced between April 2016-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase

data.name: HEPA Air Filtration Upgrade
data.description: Upgrade your Model S with HEPA Air Filtration for the freshest cabin air available. This package includes Bioweapon Defense Mode firmware as a feature of the HEPA system and comes with a new HEPA filter.
data.note: Compatible with Model S vehicles with updated front bumper fascia and produced between April 2016-2020. Once you have completed checkout for this item, please schedule a Service appointment for installation in your Tesla app. Shipping to your preferred Tesla Service Center and installation are included with purchase

data.name: Model S Key Band
data.description: Custom made and available for every model, the Tesla Key Band provides a sleek and convenient key solution to your current key fob. Comprised of a silicone band attached to a metal key ring and finished with a tastefully embossed logo, the key band is a perfect fit for any model.
data.note: Compatible with all Model S vehicles. Key fob not included.

data.name: Key Card
data.description: Model S, Model 3, Model X, and Model Y vehicles come with two Key Cards and one bifold wallet for easy entry, operation and transport. Key Cards are convenient for when your phone is not accessible, out of battery or if someone else needs temporary access, such as a valet.
data.note: Compatible with Model S and Model X vehicles produced in 2021+ and all Model 3 and Model Y vehicles. Access cannot be granted from the passenger side of the vehicle.
